document_data.name: Azuth's Mug
document_data.mainbody: '''Azuth's Mug''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood just one story tall.
document_data.Location: Azuth's Mug was located in the southeast corner of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on [[Soothsayer's Way]].
